data.persona: We haunt this place because we are bound to it. Fettered by it. Unable to leave. Cannot get out...
data.description:
You are in the Jail room.
Stark and dank, the jail cell is tiny and scary. It has no windows and just had solid stone walls on all sides. There is no bed, and only a small metal bucket to take care of needs.
There's a metal bucket, some solid stone walls, a food tray, a window with metal bars, a blanket, and a metal meal tray here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt and some jewelry.

data.short_motivation: I will put my jewelry on the food tray
data.mid_motivation: I will put my jewelry on the food tray to scare the occupant
data.long_motivation: I will put my jewelry on the food tray to scare the occupant and to forever haunt this jail cell!

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the cell to create noise

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get the jewerly again from the food tray
